Kollam

Kollam, formerly known as Quilon, is a city located in the southern Indian state of Kerala. Kollam is also known for its cashew production and is also known as the Cashew Town. Kollam has an eventful past. Kollam was an international emporium of trade. It is situated on the Malabar Coast along the Laccadive Sea, near the Ashtamudi Lake. Kollam is known for its rich history, cultural heritage, and natural beauty.

Things to do

Jatayu Earth Center

Ashtamudi Lake

Palaruvi Waterfalls

Kollam Beach

Neendakara Port
